summary: Implements a mock AWS Batch backend that runs each submitted job in its own Docker container, managing compute environments, job queues, scheduling policies and job definitions, and handling job submission, status tracking, cancellation and termination, with an optional lightweight mode that instantly marks jobs successful.
business_intent: Enable developers to test and develop batch workloads locally by emulating AWS Batch behavior without contacting the real service, using Docker for realistic execution or a simple mock mode for fast success marking.
